title: Lemon sesame digestive biscuits
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '150g wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '30g medium oatmeal', '20g bran', '100g dark muscovado sugar', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '50g unsalted butter, cut into small pieces', '4 tablespoons milk, or as needed']
